thread.title: Ghana striker Assifuah scores to steer Sion to fifth in Swiss top-flight
thread.title_full: Ghana striker Assifuah scores to steer Sion to fifth in Swiss top-flight

title: Ghana striker Assifuah scores to steer Sion to fifth in Swiss top-flight
text:
18:10 CET Ghana striker Assifuah scores to steer Sion to fifth in Swiss top-flight - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana striker Ebenezer Assifuah scored on Sunday to help his Swiss top-flight club Sion to defeat nine-man Grasshopper 3-2 in the league match. 
The visitors raced into a 2-0 by the 24th minute of the game but Assifuah headed in in the 39th minute to restore some home for the home side. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
